cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with the problem of distributed storage and repair bandwidth, which falls under the scope of information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the need for systematic storage and exact regeneration, which are topics related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also mentions interference alignment, which is a technique used in wireless networks and falls under the scope of signal processing (cs.SI) and networking (cs.NI).
